zlibrary

Class ZComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • zlibrary.ZComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ZDrawable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ZEntity, ZImage, ZPopup, ZTextArea

    public abstract class ZComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements ZDrawable
    ZComponent is the abstract base class for all Z-components. It stores an Image and the location of said Image.
    Since:
    2015-02-20
    Version:
    1.0 <2015-02-20>
    Author:
    Anton Andrén & Mattias Benngård
